Package monteCarloPricing

Class MCPricer

  • Object
    • MCPricer
  • public class MCPricer
extends Object
    Class allows for calculation of option prices and corresponding greeks. The computation of the results is based on Monte-Carlo Simulation.
    Author:
    thesste

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MCPricer​(double underlyingPrice, double sigma, double interestRate, int numberOfPaths, int numberOfTradingDaysPerYear, double maxMaturityInYears)
      This methods constructs the pricer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MCPricer

        public MCPricer​(double underlyingPrice,
                double sigma,
                double interestRate,
                int numberOfPaths,
                int numberOfTradingDaysPerYear,
                double maxMaturityInYears)
        This methods constructs the pricer.
        Parameters:
        underlyingPrice - underlying price
        sigma - underlying's volatility
        interestRate - market's risk-free interest rate
        numberOfPaths - number of paths to be generated
        numberOfTradingDaysPerYear - number of trading days per year
        maxMaturityInYears - maximum maturity of the options that can be priced

      • nextDaysUnderlyingEodPrice

        public double nextDaysUnderlyingEodPrice​(double previousUnderlyingEodPrice,
                                         double randomCurrent,
                                         double volatility)
        Calculates the next day's underlying price with the underlying price following a Geometric Brownian Motion over time
        Parameters:
        previousUnderlyingEodPrice - previous end-of-day underlying price
        randomCurrent - (normally distributed) random increment
        volatility - underlying's volatility
        Returns:
        subsequent end-of-day underlying price

      • generatePaths

        public void generatePaths()
        Generates random underlying paths (by Geometric Brownian Motion) according to the specified class instance attributes. To allow for calculation of the trade's greeks also paths for slightly changed input parameters are generated.

      • restrictPathsByOptionsMaturity

        public double[][] restrictPathsByOptionsMaturity​(double[][] simulatedPaths,
                                                 double maturity)
        Simulated paths are cut off at the trade's maturity.
        Parameters:
        simulatedPaths - simulated paths
        maturity - option's maturity
        Returns:
        cut off paths

      • calculateDiscountedPayoff

        public double calculateDiscountedPayoff​(double payoff,
                                        double maturity)
        Calculates discounted payoff based on market's risk-free rate
        Parameters:
        payoff - payoff
        maturity - maturity
        Returns:
        discounted payoff

      • calculateDiscountedPayoffsForPaths

        public double[] calculateDiscountedPayoffsForPaths​(double[][] paths,
                                                   double strike,
                                                   double barrier,
                                                   double maturity,
                                                   String optionType,
                                                   String barrierType)
        Calculates the discounted pay-offs for the paths
        Parameters:
        paths - paths
        strike - strike price
        barrier - barrier value
        maturity - maturity
        optionType - option type
        barrierType - barrier type
        Returns:
        discounted payoffs for each path

                                   double barrier,

                                   String optionType,
                                   String barrierType)
        Calculates the option price for 2 types of options: Plain vanilla options and barrier options
        Parameters:
        strike - strike price
        barrier - barrier value
        maturity - maturity
        optionType - option type
        barrierType - barrier type
        Returns:
        option's price
